name: Kathy Warner
coverLetter:
From 2011 - 2016 I've grown medical marijuana for 4 patients, so I have experience handling marijuana. I've trimmed most of my harvest myself. Over 5 years I worked with up to 8 dispensaries to supply them with product that was tested according to the laws of Oregon and was proven clean with respectable THC content on every test.
Working with the dispensaries for 5 yrs, growing marijuana successfully for 5 yrs combined with my 22+ previous years of owning and running a successful business would allow me to be successful in many different positions in the marijuana field. 
My application for the Oregon Marijuana Handler's Card has been submitted.
My resume is available upon request
